arts.ttl: Arsenal icon makes Dowman prediction, Invincibles comparison before Brighton game
arts.sum: An Arsenal Invincible predicts whether Max Dowman could start in Wednesday's EFL Cup clash with Brighton & Hove Albion as he compares Mikel Arteta's current squad to the 2003-04 title-winning team.

arts.ttl: Arsenal drop Max Dowman and Piero Hincapie hint before Brighton cup clash

arts.ttl: Mikel Arteta could unearth never-before-seen partnership for Arsenal against Brighton
Carabao Cup blow for Arsenal as key pair ruled out of Brighton clash with injuries - but Bukayo Saka is back in contention

arts.ttl: Arsenal dealt double blow ahead of Brighton clash
arts.sum: Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta has confirmed that both William Saliba and Gabriel Martinelli have been ruled out of the Brighton game through injury. The sides face off at the Emirates Stadium on Wednesday for a place in the quarter-finals of the League Cup, with kickoff slated for 7.45pm BST. arts.ttl: Three in, two out: Arteta reveals Arsenal team news for Brighton clash
arts.sum: Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta issues a quintuple fitness update and drops a possible Max Dowman hint ahead of Wednesday's EFL Cup fourth-round battle with Brighton & Hove Albion.
